member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE
member.summary: The NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE enumeration type specifies theNDIS network interface connection state.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE.MediaConnectStateUnknown
member.summary: The connection state of the interface is unknown.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE.MediaConnectStateConnected
member.summary: The interface is connected to the network.

member.name: NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE.MediaConnectStateDisconnected
member.summary: The interface is not connected to the network.
